welcome.name: General
welcome.content: # Mongo-Eco - Welcome Mongo-Eco is a powerful module that allows you to create economy system in your bot. ## **Installation** ``` npm install @shinchanop/mongo-eco ``` ```js //Import package const economy = require("@shinchanop/mongo-eco"); //create new economy() Class const eco = new economy('YOUR MONGODB URI'); // use the methods eco.(); //returns -> Promise -> ``` **Join our [Discord Server](https://discord.gg/emD44ZJaSA) for Support** **For more help view [Documentation](https://mongo-eco.js.org)** **[Example Bot](https://github.com/Yash094/Mongo-Eco/tree/main/Example-Bot) Made With Mongo Eco** ## **Features** * **Super simple** * **Easy to use** * **Beginner-friendly** * **Great Support** * **Flexible** # HOW DOES IT WORK ``` const economy = require("@shinchanop/mongo-eco"); const eco = new economy('YOUR MONGODB URI'); ``` # EXAMPLE ``` //Import package const economy = require("@shinchanop/mongo-eco"); //create new economy() Class const eco = new economy('YOUR MONGODB URI'); eco.(); //returns -> Promise -> ```

methods.name: Methods
